function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Capturing contactless screening data from millions of patients","Impact":"Risk of data privacy and security breaches, potential misuse of sensitive health information","Mitigation":"Implementing strict data privacy regulations and encryption protocols, conducting regular security audits","Technologies":"Data encryption, blockchain, secure authentication protocols","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data analysts","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments, cybersecurity experts"},{"Description":"Skyrocketing calls to service centers in airline, hospitality, banking industries","Impact":"Overwhelmed support systems, potential spread of contagious diseases in crowded service centers","Mitigation":"Implementing remote customer service solutions, reducing in-person interactions, providing protective equipment for on-site staff","Technologies":"Remote communication tools, AI chatbots, virtual customer service platforms","People":"Service center staff, customers, general public","Owner":"Companies, government health agencies, technology providers"},{"Description":"Increasing reliance on chatbots for customer service","Impact":"Risk of misinformation, customer dissatisfaction, and loss of human touch in customer interactions","Mitigation":"Training chatbots for accurate responses, incorporating human oversight in chatbot interactions, providing options for human customer service","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, natural language processing, sentiment analysis","People":"Customers, customer service representatives, chatbot developers","Owner":"Companies, customer service professionals, AI researchers"}]}
